page.title: 05Industry in Thorney
page.content: In{Thorney}there are about{9 {industries,}and most of them are medium sized firms. The biggest industry in Thorney is{Peacocks {Builders.}They have built a lot of estates around Peterborough.{Thorney {Precision Ltd}is a very small light engineering company who do work for other companies in{Thorney.}There is a company called{Fitzjohn Builders and a small company called{Beeton {Bros.}They are builders and bee farmers. Other companies in the village are{Dave Wagg,}(builders), {Harlock,}(manufacturers of forklift trucks),{Jary and Munns}(builders), and{Box-O-Freight,}(road haulage contractors). There is also a company called{Bridge Engineering which we have looked at in more detail on{page 6.
